author: chfast
content: <@689161464829050960> Are you planning to do the fix in EELS?

author: marioevz
content:
PSA just a heads up that tests in the last release under `cancun/eip4844_*` do contain filled tests for Prague fork.

This is because we parametrize tests to automatically update previous-fork tests to fill using new parameters.

In this case, the 4844 tests have been updated from `target=3,max=6` to `target=6,max=9` due to EIP-7691, so these new tests are filled and placed in the same folder!
